Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 080020 PQX, the acquisition of real property located at 860 East 161st Street, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 17, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter.  This action is subject to review and action by the Council only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(3)of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
